short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to calculate and display a count down for Resin Regeneration for Genshin Impact Players.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to keep track of Resin Restoration. You can input the hours and minutes remaining for full restore and every time you click the extension you can see the time remaining and how much Resin has been regenerated. This can be helpful to plan and manage your game time.
